__e: I'm bound by God to honor the sanctity of the confessional, but I can tell you right now, it's not this man.
I realize I violated the sanctity of mystery date but I just thought the family should all be together today.
You don't believe in the sanctity of divorce, do you?
Make way for His Holiness, the Pope of Rome!
I have come to serve upon you the papers of annulment, formally ending your marriage with the princess Gisla.
Your Holiness, the check and I will be in the car.
You always talk to me about my holiness, the miracle I've supposedly performed, but you never tell me anything about the only miracle I need,
Summon that cat-piss-smelling fuckhead and His Holiness the Sheriff.
THAT AN INDIAN LIFE IS WORTH MORE OR LESS THAN ANOTHER.
That's right. I only ask that you respect the sanctity of the island. And if I have concern, I come to you.
Have you been known for your chaste life?
